# cook your dish here
for i in range(int(input())):
 t = int(input())
 Alice = list(map(int,input().split()))
 Bob = list(map(int,input().split()))
 tot_Alice = 0
 tot_Bob = 0
 total = []
 for j,k in zip(Alice,Bob):
  if (tot_Alice==tot_Bob) and (j==k):
   total.append(j)
   tot_Alice += j 
   tot_Bob += k 
  else:
   tot_Alice += j 
   tot_Bob += k 
 print(sum(total))

# cook your dish here
def walk(n,m,o):
 a=0
 b=0
 tot=0
 for i in range(n):
  if((m[i]==o[i]) and (a==b)):
   tot+=m[i]
  a+=m[i]
  b+=o[i]
 return tot
t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 n=int(input())
 m=list(map(int, input().split()))
 o=list(map(int, input().split()))
 print(walk(n,m,o))

T = int(input())
ans = []

for _ in range(T):
 N = int(input())
 A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
 B = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

 xa = 0
 xb = 0
 distance = 0

 for i in range(N):
  if(xa==xb and A[i]==B[i]):
   distance += A[i]
  xa += A[i]
  xb += B[i]

 ans.append(distance)

for i in ans:
 print(i)

for _ in range(int(input())):
 N = int(input())
 A = list(map(int, input().split()))
 B = list(map(int, input().split()))
 d1, d2 = [0], [0]
 s1 = s2 = ans = 0
 for i in range(N):
  s1 += A[i]
  s2 += B[i]
  d1.append(s1 * (i+1))
  d2.append(s2 * (i+1))
 #  print(d1, d2)
 for i in range(N):
  if (d1[i] == d2[i]) and (d1[i+1] == d2[i+1]):
   ans += A[i]
 print(ans)
